com.gensym.jgi
Interface G2ItemForJavaObjectFactory

public interface G2ItemForJavaObjectFactory

This interface is used by G2JavaStubController to enable external factories to return a G2 Item to associated for a specified java Object.

Method Summary
 Item getG2ItemForJavaObject(G2Access connection, Object javaObject)
          The method should return a G2 Item for the Java object, or null if no G2 Item was appropriate
 

Method Detail

getG2ItemForJavaObject

public Item getG2ItemForJavaObject(G2Access connection,
                                   Object javaObject)
                            throws G2AccessException
The method should return a G2 Item for the Java object, or null if no G2 Item was appropriate
